SEARCH RESULTS

Dubai Trade will be celebrating the 8th edition of the E-Services Excellence

This category will be focused on the theme of transition to mobile services in comparison to online services. There will be 8 awards under this category as following

This year, the winners are chosen based on a criteria that reflects the highest increase in business transactions with the following conditions:

  1. 1. Company should be registered with Dubai Trade Portal
  2. 2. Calculations based on growth mobile transactions in comparision to online transactions
  3. 3. The count of transactions will be of key e-Services
